name: Super-Quantal Quick Switch
text: Target 1 "Super Quantal" Xyz monster you control; send it to the GY and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Super Quantal" Xyz monster 1 Rank higher or lower from your Extra Deck, then attach 1 monster from your Deck with the same Attribute to that monster as an Xyz material. You can only activate "Super Quantal Quick Switch" once per turn.
